entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
